content.question: Three blocks are connected by strings and pulled to the right by a force with magnitude <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown in the figure above. All frictional forces are negligible. The tension in the right and left strings have magnitudes <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively. Taking the positive direction to be toward the right, which of the following is a correct equation of motion for the block of mass <math alttext="m sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="T sub 1, plus T sub 2, equals m sub 2, times a." overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T sub 1, minus T sub 2, equals m sub 2, times a." overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T sub 1, plus F sub 0, minus T sub 2, equals m sub 2, times a." overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
